Package game.monsters

Class DebuffMonster

java.lang.Object
game.monsters.Monster
game.monsters.DebuffMonster
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchaseable
public class DebuffMonster extends Monster
A special type of Monster, with a second attack which applies a debuff to the enemies damage.

      Returns:
      String. A random name for a DebuffMonster

    • makeMove

      public String makeMove(int move, Monster enemy)
      Performs debuff attack if move is 1, else calls base Monster makeMove().
      Overrides:
      makeMove in class Monster
      Parameters:
      move - int. The move to perform (should be an index of attack strings)
      enemy - Monster. The enemy monster to perform the move against.
      Returns:
      String. A message summarising the move for display purpases.

    • makeRandomMove

      public String makeRandomMove(Monster enemy)
      50% chance to make a debuff attack, else makes a basic attack.
      Overrides:
      makeRandomMove in class Monster
      Parameters:
      enemy - Monster. The enemy monster
      Returns:

    • debuff

      private String debuff(Monster enemy)
      Applies a debuff to the enemy for 3 turns of a third of this monster's attack damage.
      Parameters:
      enemy - Monster. The enemy Monster to apply the debuff to.
      Returns:
      String. A description of the debuff attack.
